channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Competition: Today is the grown-ups' singing competition at the theatre and the kids are the judges. The children jump up and down and sing along. Everybody loves singing! (S7, ep 37).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After: At the playgroup, Madame Gazelle is reading a story, but a page is missing so she makes up an ending. During playtime, the children make up their own endings too! (S7, ep 35).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Larenzo Lion: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaurs Alive!; Being Babies: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson: Madame Gazelle is giving the playgroup a singing lesson, helped by Mummy Rhino on the piano. When the parents arrive, the children perform their song. (S7, ep 36).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes To School: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Ant Farm: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's Birthday: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George's Wooly Hat: George has a new hat and Mummy Pig is determined that George doesn't get it muddy when visiting Grandpa and Granny Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Canal Boat: It's Captain Daddy Dog's birthday and Mummy Dog surprises him with the gift of a boat trip, which isn't quite what he had expected.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig's Greenhouse: Grandpa Pig and Grandpa Dog are showing and sharing their lovely, tomato filled, Greenhouses to Peppa and George.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.desc: The pups help the Mayor go skydiving in 'The Crew Builds An Indoor Skydiving Centre', then in 'The Crew Builds A Roller Rink', Wheeler and Truffles try some new wheels. (S2, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure. (S3, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Cat Burglar: It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: What Now?: In the snowy forest, the Brave Bunnies find the road blocked by a drift. While Ma and Pa clear the way, Bop and Boo make a big snowball with their moose friend, Dwayne. (S1, ep 37).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Bubble Trouble: The Brave Bunnies stop in the plains so Pa and Ma can wash the bus. Bop and Boo grab bubble kits and set off to play. They meet a mouse and invite her to join the fun. (S1, ep 38).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Rain Music: Bop and Boo are ready to fly their kite on the Plains, when it starts to rain. A young frog named Arnold hops by, surprised to see their frowns. (S1, ep 35).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Spongey-Saurus: Gabby unboxes a tiny, spongey capsule that grows into a big, spongey dinosaur when she puts it in the Garden pond. Spongey-Saurus loves being a big dino! (S3, ep 10).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Motorbiking; Sea Treasure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Lizzy's Lemonade Blaze:Mayor Humdinger and his kitties accidentally set Lizzy's Lemonade Stand and parts of Foggy Bottom ablaze. It's up to the pups to extinguish the fires! (S11, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.title: Rubble & Crew

channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: No one's food is safe in 'The Forest Food Bandit', then in 'The Case of the Absent Giraffe', Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Lil Pal finds Kendrick's lost wedding ring in 'The Jester's Ring', then in 'Greg the Collectible', Greg is mistaken for a plush collectible and gets trapped in Harry's friend's backpack. (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Giants in the Meadow: Lucy's dad is digging up the meadow and the Little Kingdom is in danger.

channel.desc: Cows: The children are at the Elf Farm, but to learn where milk comes from they must visit a big farm, to find cows. They travel to Lucy Big's farm, where she shows them all the animals.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.desc: New TV; Indoor Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.desc: House Rules; Big Announcement: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Folk Music Band: Peppa and George are in Granny and Grandpa Pig's Garden. Granny's friends are playing folk music! They play music for Grandpa Pig and then Grandpa Pig makes apple juice for everyone.

channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help fix their friend's running shoes in 'Run Cynthia Run', then in 'Dora In Space', Dora and Boots rescue Tico from space after his spaceship falls apart! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Alex and Mr Porter are delivering pizza for a big party when the van spins out of control in 'Pups Save a Pizza', and in 'Pups Save Skye', Skye crash lands in the snow, and needs a rescue of her own.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humdingder turns into a baby in 'Pups Save Baby Humdinger', then in 'Pups Save a Pinata', Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The pals search for who nabbed a crab's spiral shell home in 'The Case of the Blue Bandit', then in 'The Honey Badger Break-In', Sweetie sneaks onto Sam and Kit's bee-infested aircraft. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Super Thinkers!: Gabby, Pandy and Carlita attend DJ Catnip's Super Thinker Camp, where they tackle the puzzles and obstacles so they can earn their rainbow capes and become Super Thinkers. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Factory: The Elf Factory is deep down in the roots of The Great Elf Tree. It is almost Christmas time and the elves are busy making toys. Some magic saves the day when there is a problem.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: In The Future; Kiddie Workout: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pizza! Pizza!; The Sandcastle: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Bull The Teacher; Grandpa's Rock Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Swimming Lesson; Peppa's Diary: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must find the missing flounder in 'Pups Save a Disappearing Flounder', then in 'Pups Save Little Grandpa and Mr. Alex', the pups help track down the missing Mini Patrol. (S10, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In: Peppa is playing at Suzy's house and they find out that Granny Sheep is moving in! She transforms the dull spare room and attic into an exotic boudoir and creative studio.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Swift: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies: Grandpa Pig has created a watering system, but he does not remember which button is which so Peppa and George help using walkie talkies. The Police hear their signal and are surprised.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do; Lenses: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding: Everyone is getting ready for Mr Bull and Mrs Cow's wedding, going to the jewellers to get rings, to the dress makers. and to sort out the wedding cake! (S7, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dolly Plum: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Tadpoles: Holly takes some frogspawn home from class to look after, but is surprised when the frogspawn turns into tadpoles overnight. Soon there are lots of little frogs for Holly to look after.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Market: Peppa and family find some great things to buy from the market and even get a special gift from Mr. Fox's stall.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Castle: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Jump: When the school roof is broken and needs fixing, Peppa volunteers Mummy Pig to do a parachute jump to raise money. Daddy Pig goes up too and has to overcome his fear of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gerald Giraffe: Gerald Giraffe is new to playgroup! He's trying to make friends with Peppa and the group, but finds being so tall is making playing hide and seek quite a challenge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games; Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Popped Top: The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off, and he needs help saving his corn crop.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snow Cat: Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's Snow Cat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead. (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes in 'Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day', then in 'Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure', Paddington discovers how to be calm. (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hop, Skip and Jump!; Rescuing Miss Rabbit!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Diary; Playing Golf: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Lifeboat: Grampy Rabbit teaches Danny Dog and Peppa why his lifeboat is so important when it comes to saving lives at sea, and gives them tips on how to stay safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Issy and Mo
channel.desc: Meet Issy and her water-loving chocolate Labrador, Mo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! When a group of baby ducklings waddles away from their mummy, it's up to Issy and Mo to bring them back safe and.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora is shrunk by Big Red Chicken's magic in 'Little Dora's Big Adventure', then in 'Bye Bye Balloon', Dora and Boots help get Benny's Balloon under control. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Benny embrace his singing skills in 'Singin' in the Tub', then in 'Show and Share', Dora helps Boots find something for Show and Share. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Castaway Cadets: A paddleboard trip turns into a survival challenge on a deserted island.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Little Trev's Turtle: Big Trev tells a childhood story while waiting for his old turtle friend, Salty.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Dollhouse Fairytales: Tall tales come to life with a king, a mermaid and so much more as Gabby and the gang create and celebrate enchanting fairytales in a storybook castle. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Elana and Meeka
channel.desc: We meet Elana and Meeka, a mixed-breed dog, as they join The Real Pup Squad! There's a big mess in the garden - plastic bottles, cardboard boxes, and all sorts of rubbish everywhere. Their mission? To.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets baby crocs to sleep in 'Croc-A-Bye Baby', The Troll appears in 'Wanna Empanada?', Boots tries new boots in 'if The Boot Fits', and the twins have problems with a 'Pinata Party'. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Smurfette and Grouchy compete to decide who is the best in 'The Battle of the Sitters', and in 'Let's Smurf To Mars', Blossom dreams of going to Mars and can count on her friends to help. (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Meteorite finds a night club in the forest in 'Disco Smurf', then in 'Dwayne's New Toy', Diaper Daddy is looking for a more loving family after being betrayed by Handy. (S4, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots have to get a picture of a rare bird for Abuela in 'Catch The Quickatoo', then in 'Lost Lorito', Dora and Boots return a baby parrot home, who can't stop copying Boots. (S1, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Trees: Peppa and her family are visiting an adventure park. Miss Rabbit is in charge, and they have fun working their way around an obstacle course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Canoe Trip: Peppa and her family hire a canoe from Miss Rabbit. They imagine they are in a jungle and then actually bump into Mrs Crocodile. Then Mr Lion invites them to a picnic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaur Party!; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A Day With Doctor Hamster; Playgroup Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Jolly's Riding Club: Ben, Holly and their friends go on a snail trek with Miss Jolly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Spies: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Big Ben & Holly: When a spell accidentally goes wrong, Ben and Holly grow to human size! Now they can play with Lucy and her friends, and want to stay big forever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bowling; Swimming Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cruise Ship Holiday; Holiday on the Sea: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Tropical Day Trip; Sailing Home: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Abraca-Diesel: As the engines are delivering items for a magic show, Sandy and Diesel decide to do a magic disappearing act, but then Sandy disappears for real! (S27, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Overcommitted: When Thomas promises to spend time with both Nia and Kana he tries to be in two places at once, which proves to be impossible. (S27, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George have fun playing detectives in 'Mysteries', and then in 'George's Friend', George makes friends with Richard Rabbit at the playground.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Scarecrow; The Time Capsule: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Castaway Cadets: A paddleboard trip turns into a survival challenge on a deserted island.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Little Trev's Turtle: Big Trev tells a childhood story while waiting for his old turtle friend, Salty.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Dimwitty and Clumsy get rid of the fire truck in 'Fire Brigade on Foot', then in 'The Prettiest Pebble in the World', Gargamel leaves magic pebbles in the forest to hypnotize the Smurfs. (S4, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora throws a super-secret surprise party in 'Abuela's Quinceanera', then in 'Story Time', Dora's friend Coco doesn't have a story, so they go to the Tall Tale Tree in search of one! (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi are getting married, but a big storm blows in to town in 'Pups Save the Wedding', and then in 'Pups Save an Ace', Skye's favourite stunt pilot, Ace Soarenson, pays a visit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Roger's frozen food delivery truck gets stuck in a ditch in 'Pups Chill Out', then in 'Pups Save Farmer Alex', Farmer Yumi's animals are stampeding towards town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Indie helps the pals rehome a lost bee in 'The Hunt for the Hidden Hive', then in 'The Trouble of the Toppled Trees', Sam and Kit try to uncover who has been chewing the forest trees. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat's Puzzle Hunt: The Gabby Cats have set up a puzzle hunt in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy solve riddles, look for clues and complete puzzle challenges. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Doctor Hamster's Big Present; Little Cars: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roman Day; Health Check: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Looking for Things; Woodland Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Recorders; Playing Golf: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Buddy the playful dragon from one of Alex's books gets out in 'Pups Save a Playful Dragon', and then in 'Pups Save the Critters', Francois's critters have gotten loose.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wedding Day: It's the day of Mrs Cow and Mr Bull's wedding! Not everything goes to plan, but that doesn't stop it being the best wedding ever, and there is a lot of happy crying! (S7, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus! (S7, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Movie Night; Art House Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wildflower Wood: Madame Gazelle and Mr Bull lead the children to the wildflower wood to learn all about flowers. The children enjoy identifying Wild Garlic, Bluebells and even an orchid! (S7, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick; Racquet Games: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus: Miss Rabbit arrives with the broken bus. This is a job for Grampy Rabbit! Once fixed, Mummy Rabbit and Rebecca Rabbit arrive with a cake for Grampy Rabbit's birthday! (S7, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Day Off: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.
